description: Liberate yourself from heavy framed bindings. The ST Rotation 10 Binding has a rotating toe-piece inspired by the Radical 2.0 line, but with a self-centering mode that makes stepping-in easier. It reduces the odds of pre-release when you get a sudden jolt or heavy landing, but without the trickiness of stepping into a rotating toe-piece. Lightness beckons for your next alpine tour or freeride/freeski shenanigans.Made of 7075 forged aluminum, chromoly steel and high-strength plastic.Easy step-in is made possible with the self-centering toe-piece.TÜV certified binding ensures precise, coordinated toe and heel unit release.Bore hole template is designed in line with maximum norm dimensions for optimum power transfer.Ultra-low height allows direct boot-to-ski contact.Wide rail baseplate provides an extra-wide binding surface area.10mm forward pressure for length adjustment when ski is flexed.45mm of length adjustment (22.5mm forward and back) for compatibility with multiple boots.
name: Dynafit ST Rotation 10 Bindings
